title: Roast Cornish Game Hen with Spicy Fruit Salsa
directions: Preheat oven to 450Â°F. Mix first 3 ingredients in medium bowl. Transfer 3 tablespoons salsa mixture to small bowl and stir in oil and allspice. Place hen halves on rack set on baking sheet. Sprinkle with salt and pepper; brush with oil mixture. Roast until juices run clear when thigh is pierced, about 25 minutes. Transfer hen halves to plates. Spoon remaining salsa mixture on top.
ingredients: 1 1 3/4-pound Cornish game hen, split in half along backbone
